mapper.select: select question_no, member_code, question_title, question_original_filename, question_renamed_filename, question_date, question_open from question_board order by question_no
mapper.insert: insert into question_board(question_no, member_code, question_title, question_content, question_original_filename, question_renamed_filename , question_date) values(seq_question_board.nextval, #{memberCode}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionContent}, #{questionOriginalFilename}, #{questionRenamedFilename} , sysdate)
